title: User-Centered Virtual Learning Environment Design and Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool utilization skills and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Customized virtual learning environment development and competency-building program for current language practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply user-centered design principles in virtual learning environments.
Learners can plan and prototype a mobile-optimized virtual space for language learning.
Learners can propose improvements for virtual learning environments based on user feedback.

resources: Mobile-Friendly Development Tools (Unity 3D WebGL, CoSpaces, etc.)
Open-Source Virtual Learning Materials for Case Analysis
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
